name: Highway of death
description:
Highway of death - this race, which require from player good reaction. Maneuver the car in different directions, so as not to crash and overtake the car as well as to collect the stars. Management is carried out by means of two keys "left" and "right". To successfully complete the level of the game, the player must collect a certain minimum number of stars. The game has 10 levels. The higher the level,the greater the speed of the car!

Key features:
- Random world generation
- Increasing speed depending on the selected level.
- The game is suitable for all ages!
- Pleasant design of the game
- 40 achievements
